DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 randomize , multicenter , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study evaluate efficacy HT-0712 improve memory cognitive performance subject Age-Associated Memory Impairment ( AAMI )
DOC.brief_title: HT-0712 v . Placebo Subjects With Age-Associated Memory Impairment ( AAMI )
DOC.criteria: Main Complaints memory loss everyday life Performance least one standard deviation mean establish young adult standardized memory test Absence dementia Intact global intellectual function Main Diagnosis Mild Cognitive Impairment ( MCI ) Alzheimer 's Disease Evidence dementia Evidence psychiatric neurological disorder could influence cognition contribute subject 's memory loss Use drug could influence cognition
